caption.p: The effect of different concentrations of LRE extracts on the expression of antioxidant genes (catalase (CAT), superoxide dismutase (SOD1 and SOD2) and glutathione peroxidase (GPx)) in HT22 cells given alone or in combination with 5 mM glutamate. ( a) CAT; ( b) DOD1; ( c) SOD2; ( d) GPx. Values are mean Â± SEM of at least three independent runs. # p < 0.05; ## p < 0.01; ### p < 0.001 vs. control; * p < 0.05; ** p < 0.01; *** p < 0.001 vs. glutamate alone.
